title: Hi There!
text:
I am an Assistant Professor at Waseda University, Faculty of Political Science and Economics.
My research fields are political economy and experimental economics.
 PhD International Public Policy ∙ OSIPP, Osaka University ∙ 2025
 MA International Public Policy ∙ OSIPP, Osaka University ∙ 2022
 BA International Public Policy ∙ Law Faculty, Osaka University ∙ 2020
